meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the September 3, 2024, Economic Development Committee Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Survey of Dallas business owners
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the survey results conducted by ETC Institute.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: The East Dock Redevelopment Project
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the redevelopment project at East Clarendon Drive and South Ewing Avenue.

agenda_items.description: Discussion on nominees for the Dallas Economic Development Corporation Board of Directors.

agenda_items.title: Self-Certification Program Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the self-certification program by the Planning & Development department.

agenda_items.title: Oversize Motor Vehicle Regulation Updates
agenda_items.description: Updates on regulations regarding oversize motor vehicles.
